channel.title: Comments on: Watch Me (and 23 Others!) During 24 Hours of PASS: Summit Preview
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Pete! I hope you can make it to Summit. Start planning now for 2012!

I recommend Microsoft速 SQL Server速 2008 Reporting Services Step by Step – Stacia Misner – http://www.amazon.com/Microsoft%C2%AE-Server%C2%AE-Reporting-Services-Microsoft/dp/0735626472/ref=sr_1_4?ie=UTF8&qid=1312426120&sr=8-4.

Two other really great resources are Jessica Moss and Bill Pearson.

item.title: By: Pete
item.dc:creator: Pete
item.description: you mentioned some reporting services books at the end of your 24HourPASS session. Could you post your top 3 suggestions, I could not take notes at that time.<br /> Session was great. If there is money for training I hope to get to Summit. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
you mentioned some reporting services books at the end of your 24HourPASS session. Could you post your top 3 suggestions, I could not take notes at that time.
Session was great. If there is money for training I hope to get to Summit. Thanks
